original_text: But a prophet of the Lord was there, whose name was Oded, and he went out to meet the army that came to Samaria and said to them, “Behold, because the Lord, the God of your fathers, was angry with Judah, he gave them into your hand, but you have killed them in a rage that has reached up to heaven.
korean_text: 그 곳에 여호와의 선지자가 있는데 이름은 오뎃이라 그가 사마리아로 돌아오는 군대를 영접하고 그들에게 이르되 너희 조상의 하나님 여호와께서 유다에게 진노하셨으므로 너희 손에 넘기셨거늘 너희의 노기가 충천하여 살륙하고

sentences.original_text: But a prophet of the Lord was there
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주의 한 선지자가 그곳에 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and he went out to meet the army
because the Lord, the God of your fathers, was angry with Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 조상의 하나님 주께서 유다를 진노하셨으므로

sentences.original_text: he gave them into your hand
